name: Single Serve Hot & Iced Coffee Maker with Strong Brew, 40oz Removable Reservoir, 6 Brew Sizes, Compatible with K Cup and Grounds, Compact for Home, Office, RV and Dorm, Black (2.0 Version)
short_description: 2 WAY COFFEE MEETS 3 BREW STYLES: Choose from Classic, Bold, or Over Ice for your grounds or coffee pods REMOVABLE 40 OZ TANK: Brew 4-5 cups before refilling with the detachable reservoir 6 BREW SIZES: Select from cup sizes of 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, or 24 oz for delicious coffee brewed instantly in minutes SPLASH-PREVENTING & TRAVEL MUG FRIENDLY: Features a heightened drip tray to prevent coffee splashing due to gravity when dispensing. Accommodates travel mugs up to 7.3” tall after removing drip trays EASY TO CLEAN: The built-in cleaning function helps eliminate calcium deposits. The parts are removable and dishwasher safe ENERGY SAVER: Auto shut-off after 10 minutes to save energy SAFE TO USE: Constructed from safe, BPA-free materials. Includes features like a water-shortage alert and dry boil protection SPACE-SAVING & CONVENIENT: Compact design fits small spaces. The reusable filter basket with a hinged lid can also brew tea leaves, includes recipe book for iced coffee

name: Mini Single Serve Coffee Maker for K Cup and Ground Coffee, Fast Brew One Cup Coffee Machine with Descaling Reminder and Water Window, 6 to 12 oz. Brew Sizes, Black
short_description: Multi-Functional Brewing: Horavie single serve coffee maker supports both k pod and ground coffee, offering flexible brew sizes from 6 to 12oz to meet your varying coffee needs. Whether you want a quick cup or to savor a slow drink, it handles both with ease Safe and High-Quality Materials: Made from BPA-free and heat-resistant materials, this single cup coffee maker ensures durability and safety. The built-in water tank with view window allows you to monitor the water level at any time, preventing issues during brewing User-Friendly Design: This coffee machine combines fast brewing technology with one button operation mode that is simple and fast for any user. Simply press the button and enjoy hot coffee in just 120s, perfect for busy mornings or office use Ideal for Various Settings: Whether at home, in the office, or while traveling, the Horavie small coffee maker seamlessly fits into your lifestyle. Its compact design and light weight make it ideal for small kitchens, office or RVs, especially in space-limited environments Descaling Reminder & Self-Cleaning Function: The mini one cup coffee maker features an automatic descaling reminder that illuminates in red when cleaning is needed. Simply add a descaling solution and press the buttons for 2 seconds to initiate the self-cleaning process. This feature helps prevent clogging and ensures optimal performance, significantly extending the lifespan of your K-Pod coffee maker Tips: When using for the first time, brewing with clean water once can help clean the pod coffee machine and maintain a better coffee taste. Please do not exceed the maximum water level when adding water. When descaling, make sure the capsule holder or ground coffee filter is empty

name: OXO Brew Single Serve Pour-Over Coffee Maker, 12 ounces, White
short_description: Brews consistent, flavorful pour-over coffee with minimal effort Auto-drip tank controls water flow for a well-balanced brew Measurement markings on Tank show how much water to add, up to 12 ounces Lid retains heat while brewing, doubles as a drip tray Comes with 10 OXO Unbleached All-Natural #2 Cone Coffee Filters
product_description: Perfect coffee requires precision: brew time, temperature and coffee-to-water ratio must be balanced to bring out nuanced aromas and flavors. The OXO Brew Pour-Over Coffee Maker with Water Tank helps you enjoy the perks of delicious pour-over coffee with less effort. Put in your favorite coffee plus hot water, and the Coffee Maker will take it from there. Easy-read measurement markings on the Tank show how much water to add, up to 12 oz. The auto-drip Tank controls the water flow and features a precise hole pattern for even distribution over ground coffee. An included lid helps keep heat in and doubles as a drip tray when you’re finished brewing. Includes 10 OXO Unbleached All-Natural #2 Cone Coffee Filters.

name: Single Serve Coffee Maker for K-Cup and Ground Coffee, Fast Brew, 6-12 oz Brew Sizes One Cup Coffee Machine Fits 5.5" Mugs, One-Button Small Coffee Maker with Descaling Reminder,Black
short_description: 【Brew in 2 Ways】Karosie single serve coffee maker is compatible with both K pod and ground coffee, which satisfies the diverse taste needs of coffee lovers. With a brewing capacity of 6–12 oz, it features a one-button operation that fast brews a fresh cup of hot coffee. Great for chaotic mornings when you need caffeine ASAP 【Safety & Portable】The small coffee maker is made from BPA-free and heat-resistant materials to ensure durability and safety. It’s slim 4.33-inch width is idea for small kitchens, dorm rooms, offices, or RVs 【One-Button Fast Brew】Featuring one-button operation and fast brewing technology, this coffee machine brews a 12oz cup of hot coffee in fast as fast 120s 【Water Tank with View Window】The single cup coffee maker is built in a water tank with a view window for precise control of brewing strength. You can flexibly choose the amount of water to add according to your preference, thereby controlling the amount of coffee brewed 【Descaling Maintenance & Self-Cleaning】When your single cup coffee maker needs descaling, an indicator turns red. Just add descaling solution, hold the brew button for 2 seconds, and let it automatically clean itself. This prevents clogs and ensures optimal performance, extending the lifespan of your one cup coffee maker 【Usage Tips】When using for the first time, brewing with clean water once can help clean the pod coffee maker and maintain a better coffee taste. Please do not exceed the maximum water level when adding water. When descaling, make sure the capsule holder or ground coffee filter is empty

name: Keurig K-Slim Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Multistream Technology, 3 Brew Sizes, Slim and Sleek Design, 46oz Removable Reservoir, Black
short_description: MULTISTREAM TECHNOLOGY: Extracts full flavor and aroma in every brew. FITS ANYWHERE: Less than 5 inches wide, perfect for small spaces. MULTIPLE CUP WATER RESERVOIR: Removable 46 oz. reservoir lets you brew up to *4 cups before refilling. BREWS MULTIPLE CUP SIZES: brew an 8, 10, or 12 oz. cup at the push of a button. FAST & FRESH BREWED: Coffee made in minutes. TRAVEL MUG FRIENDLY: Removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7.0” tall and holds a full accidental brew for easy cleanup. ENERGY EFFICIENT: Auto off feature turns off your coffee maker 5 minutes after the last brew, helping to save energy.
product_description: Enjoy ease and great taste in little space with the Keurig® K-Slim® single serve coffee maker. At just 5” wide, the K-Slim® coffee maker fits neatly on your countertop, making it the perfect choice for when space-saving and simplicity are important. The K-Slim® coffee maker brings together the performance and simplicity that Keurig® is known for, in a slim and sleek design. You also get the convenience you desire with the capacity to brew up to four 8 oz. cups before refilling the 46 oz. removable water reservoir, and the ability to enjoy a fast and fresh-brewed 8, 10, or 12 oz. cup at the push of a button. Choose from hundreds of flavorful K-Cup® pod varieties of coffee, tea, cocoa, and more. With the K-Slim® coffee maker, your delicious morning cup or midday pick-me-up is always ready in minutes, and you never have to sacrifice countertop space for taste again.

name: Single serve one cup drip coffee maker 14 oz,with personal travel cup,auto shut off function,Reusable Filter,Black and Silver
short_description: Fast And Convenient——This single cup coffee maker, with 700W of power, 120V voltage and 60Hz, can quickly make a hot cup of coffee within 150s, perfect for coffee lovers! Coffee Grounds Only (Not Compatible with K-Cup Pods) Compact Design——Nehilumn one cup drip coffee maker is made of high-quality food grade materials and designed to provide long-term strength. This portable coffee maker is much smaller than others; it can easy fit on countertops and office tables. Coffee To Go——This single cup coffee maker with 450ml single layer travel cup,After brewing coffee, you can bring your personal coffee cup directly to work or travel, which is very suitable for office workers and outdoor enthusiasts. Auto Shut Off Function——This single cup coffee maker with auto shut off function, turn on the red power switch, press the white working switch when you are ready for everything, and when the coffee is finished brewing, the power will be shut off automatically, you don't need to worry about the safety. Easy To Clean——Simple operation and easy to clean, after each coffee brewing, you can rinse it with water directly to clean the filter, after that, dry it with a dry cloth and put it in a dry place to store for the next use.

name: SHARDOR K Cup Coffee Maker With Bold Setting, Single Serve Hot & Iced Coffee Maker for K-Cup and Grounds, 52oz Removable Water Tank, 6 to14oz Brew Sizes, Pod Coffee Machine With Reusable Filter, Grey
short_description: 【BOLD SETTING】Enjoy two flavor options with strength selection: Standard or Stronger brew for both iced and hot coffee. 【52 OZ REMOVABLE RESERVOIR】Large water tank enables brewing multiple cups at once, eliminating the need for frequent refills. Perfect for using it for the whole family! 【5 BREWING CAPACITIES】Available in 6, 8, 10, 12 or 14 oz capacities. 【3-IN-1 COMPATIBILITY】Compatible with K-pods, Ground Coffee & Tea:Our single cup coffee makers come with capsule holders and reusable basket filters! 【FAST & FRESH-BREWED】Brews delicious iced and hot coffee in an average of one minute. 【REMOVABLE DRIP TRAY】The removable drip tray allows for use with taller cups, ensuring compatibility with various cup heights. Holds up to 6.8'' travel mugs to minimizes spills. 【ENERGY SAVING】Auto-off function helps to save energy by turning off the coffee maker 5 minutes after the last brew.

name: Keurig K-Elite Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, with Strength and Temperature Control, Iced Coffee Capability, 8 to 12oz Brew Size, Programmable, Brushed Slate
short_description: WHAT'S IN THE BOX: One water filter handle, and one filter to help ensure your beverages taste their absolute best.Filter type:Reusable.Temperature: Adjust the brew temperature between 187° and 192°..Temperature Control : Allows you to adjust the temperature from 187° – 192 BREWS MULTIPLE CUP SIZES: 4, 6, 8, 10, 12oz Enjoy the most popular cup sizes. STRONG BREW BUTTON: Increases the strength and bold taste of your coffee’s flavor. ICED SETTING: Brew hot over ice at the touch of a button for full-flavored, delicious iced coffee. HOT WATER ON DEMAND BUTTON: Perfect for instant soups or oatmeal. FAST & FRESH BREWED: Coffee made in minutes. LARGE 75oz WATER RESERVOIR: Allows you to brew 8 cups before having to refill, saving you time and simplifying your morning routine. Removable reservoir makes refilling easy.
product_description: The Keurig K-Elite single serve brewer blends a premium Brushed Slate finish and programmable features to deliver both modern design and the ultimate in beverage customization. With a striking brushed finish and metal details, it’s a stylish addition to any kitchen. The Keurig K-Elite single serve coffee maker features Strong Brew for when you want to brew a bolder cup of coffee, and an Iced button to brew hot over ice for a refreshing, full-flavored iced coffee. It features five brew sizes, so you can brew your favorite coffee, tea, hot cocoa, or iced beverage at the touch of a button. Choose from hundreds of delicious varieties of K-Cup pods, or brew your own ground coffee using the Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (sold separately). The K-Elite brewer offers programmable features like auto on and temperature control, as well as providing hot water on demand for instant soups and oatmeal, and the large 75oz removable water reservoir lets you brew 8 cups between refills.

name: Slim Single Serve Coffee Maker, Fast Brew for K-Cup & Ground Coffee Small One Cup Coffee Maker, 6-12 Oz Brew Sizes, Coffee Machine with Descaling Reminder and Water Window,Black

With a brewing capacity of 6–12 oz, it features a one-button operation that fast brews a fresh cup of hot coffee. Great for chaotic mornings when you need caffeine ASAP 【Safety & Portable】The small coffee maker is made from BPA-free and heat-resistant materials to ensure durability and safety. At 9.45" height and 4.33" wide, the slim and space-saving design is great ideal for small kitchens, dorm rooms, RVs, and office spaces 【One-Button Brew Design】Karosie coffee machine is effortlessly simple to use, just add clean water to the water tank, choose your favorite K pod or ground coffee, one-button the brew button, enjoy a cup of hot coffee in as fast as 120s 【Water Tank with View Window】The single cup coffee maker is built in a water tank with a view window for precise control of brewing strength. You can flexibly choose the amount of water to add according to your preference, thereby controlling the amount of coffee brewed 【Descaling Maintenance & Self-Cleaning】When your single cup coffee maker needs descaling, an indicator turns red. Just add descaling solution, hold the brew button for 2 seconds, and let it automatically clean itself. This prevents clogs and ensures optimal performance, extending the lifespan of your one cup coffee maker 【Tips and Hacks】 When using for the first time, brewing with clean water once can help clean the pod coffee machine and maintain a better coffee taste. Please do not exceed the maximum water level when adding water. When descaling, make sure the capsule holder or ground coffee filter is empty

name: Keurig K-Classic Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, with 3 Brew Sizes, 48oz Removable Reservoir, Black
short_description: Note: 1)Too coarse a grind, too little coffee, or insufficiently tamping the grounds before brewing can all lead to inadequate pressure for a proper brew. 2)It is important to note that the amount of espresso extracted will vary depending on the grind size and amount and reprogramming may be needed when the size and amount are adjusted.Please refer to user guide or user manual or user guide (provided below in PDF) before first use Brews multiple k-cup pod sizes: (6, 8, 10 ounce) – the most popular k-cup pod brew sizes. Use the 6 ounce brew size to achieve the strongest brew. Large 48 ounce water reservoir: Allows you to brew 6 plus cups before having to refill, saving you time and simplifying your morning routine. The water reservoir is removable, making it easy to refill whenever you need to. Descaling: An important part of cleaning your keurig brewer. This process helps to remove calcium deposits, or scale, that can build up inside a coffee maker over time. Auto-off: An auto-off feature is easily programmed to turn off your coffee maker after it has been idle for 2 hours, helping to save energy. Simple button controls: Just insert a pod, select your desired cup brew size, and brew a great-tasting cup in under a minute. Fabric type: Plastic
product_description: The Classic Keurig K-Cup Single Serve Coffee Maker, and a perennial best-seller, the Keurig K-Classic brews a rich, smooth, and delicious cup every time with the quality you expect from Keurig. Simple touch buttons make your brewing experience stress free, and multiple K-Cup pod brew sizes help to ensure you get your perfect cup. Whether you like your coffee strong, mild, decaf, or flavored, you can brew all of your favorites with the Keurig K-Classic– and with large 48oz water reservoir, you can brew 6+ cups before having to refill. Discover hundreds of K-Cup pod varieties from all of the brands you love, including Green Mountain Coffee, Starbucks, and Lipton, and enjoy coffee, tea, hot cocoa and more. Also available in a two fun colors to complement your décor, and compatible with the Keurig Classic Series My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter, so you can brew your own ground coffee.
